titleStmt.title: The destruction and sacke cruelly committed by the Duke of Guyse and his company, in the towne of Vassy, the fyrste of Marche, in the yeare M. D. LXII.
Destruction du saccagement, exerce cruellement par le Duc de Guise en la ville de Vassy. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Sutton for Edvvarde Sutton dvvellyng in Lumbard strete at the signe of the cradell. The fyrst day of May,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Destruction du saccagement, exerce cruellement par le Duc de Guise en la ville de Vassy.
Running title reads: Great crueltie done by the duke of Guyse at Vassy.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Lumbard strete at the signe of the cradell. The fyrst day of May
